name: Bubble Bakery - Kitchen Cafe World Cooking Game
name_original: Bubble Bakery - Kitchen Cafe World Cooking Game
description:
Join 1000's of players and play along!

Enter the wonderful World of Pastries. Take a delicious bubble popping bakery tour around the globe and drool at the famous cakes and pastries that everyone just loves to munch.

Aim and fire those flavoured berry bubbles to match up three or more, clear the board and start your amazing world tour. Step up folks, the first whistle stop is good ole USA, enjoy scrummy Cherry Pie while the Statue of Liberty dons her apron and rolls out that cook book!

On to London and everyone’s favourite, Tea and Scones - yum! Now for the World! Make your way along the Bakery Blast tour map and see what gorgeous cakes are waiting round each corner of the globe. Carry on shooting those delicious berry bubbles to win yourself a new recipe book, collect them all and make your way to the dreamiest gateaux ever, waiting for you under the croissant moon!!

Challenge yourself with special timed levels to beat the clock, grab some cool aiming lines for those hard to reach berries, or go for a super fired up fire bomb to power through those bubbles.

So load up your bubbling berry pop machine, grab your apron and prepare for fun with Bakery Blast!

Featuring:

- Free to play, fun challenging gaming
- 100 Levels of Bakery adventure - more coming soon!
- Addictive match 3 Gameplay
- Leaderboards to track progress and share with your friends
- Super Aiming Lines for those hard to reach berry bubbles
- Special Timed Levels, Beat the clock!
- Share your Bakery Scores on Facebook

Visit us Online:
